definition: abbr. for 哈薩克斯坦|哈萨克斯坦[Ha1 sa4 ke4 si1 tan3], Kazakhstan/abbr. for 哈爾濱|哈尔滨[Ha1 er3 bin1], Harbin
(interj.) ha!/(onom. for laughter)/(slang) to be infatuated with/to adore/abbr. for 哈士奇[ha1 shi4 qi2], husky (dog)
surname Su/abbr. for Soviet Union 蘇維埃|苏维埃 or 蘇聯|苏联/abbr. for Jiangsu province 江蘇|江苏/abbr. for Suzhou city 蘇州|苏州
Perilla frutescens (Chinese basil or wild red basil)/place name/to revive/used as phonetic in transliteration

sentences.english: I shoot on a Hasselblad camera.
sentences.chinese: 我用的是一部哈苏相机。

sentences.english: I had invested so much in my Hasselblad system, and my Leica M6 set.
sentences.chinese: 我投了很多钱在哈苏系统和莱卡M6套机上。

sentences.english: Discussion Hasselblad digital technology, provide the user platform.
sentences.chinese: 讨论哈苏数码技术，提供用户交流平台。

sentences.english: I took this photo at Gagosian Gallery with my beloved Hasselblad camera.
sentences.chinese: 我在纽约用我挚爱的哈苏拍下了这张照片。

sentences.english: Baitullah Mehsud was eliminated by a drone strike in August 2009.
sentences.chinese: 马哈苏德被淘汰在2009年8月由无人驾驶罢工。

sentences.english: Mehsud's death is the culmination of an intense assassination campaign this year.
sentences.chinese: 马哈苏德之死是今年极度追杀活动的一个高潮。

sentences.english: Mehsud took pleasure in teasing the authorities with their failure to kill or capture him.
sentences.chinese: 马哈苏德经常得意地取笑当局未能抓获或击毙他。

sentences.english: The operation has targeted the Mehsud areas and has brought several towns under army control.
sentences.chinese: 政府军的目标是马哈苏德的地盘，并控制了几座城镇。

definition: Olympus, Japanese manufacturer of cameras and optical instruments
see 單反相機|单反相机[dan1 fan3 xiang4 ji1]
camera (abbr. for 照相機|照相机[zhao4 xiang4 ji1])/at the opportune moment/as the circumstances allow
Ricoh, Japanese imaging and electronics company
film/roll of film/also written 膠捲|胶卷
